titles.title: PROMISE Act
PROMISE Act
Promoting Responsibility Over Moderation In the Social-media Environment Act
A bill to require covered entities to implement and disclose information moderation policies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: Promoting Responsibility Over Moderation In the Social-media Environment Act or the PROMISE Act This bill requires interactive computer services (e.g., social media companies) to establish and publicly disclose policies for moderating content on their services.
